text: Jennette Michelle Faye McCurdy (born June 26, 1992) is an American writer, director, podcaster, singer, and former actress. She played Sam Puckett on the Nickelodeon TV series iCarly She reprised the character in the iCarly spin-off series Sam & Cat She also appeared in other TV series including True Jackson, VP, Malcolm in the Middle and Lincoln Heights. McCurdy grew up in Garden Grove, California. ==Early life == McCurdy was born on June 26, 1992. She was born in Long Beach, California, and grew up in Garden Grove with her parents and three older brothers. ==Beginning career == McCurdy began acting at 8 years old. She made guest appearances on Zoey 101. From 2007 to 2012, she played Sam Puckett in the TV series iCarly and the 2013 spin-off series Sam & Cat. She also made guest appearances on Malcom in The Middle. == Movies == Year Title Role Notes 2001 Shadow Fury Anna Markov 2002 My Daughter's Tears Mary Fields 2003 Hollywood Homicide Van Family Daughter 2003 Taylor Simmons Amanda Simmons 2004 Breaking Dawn Little Girl 2005 See Anthony Run Lucy Short film 2009 Minor Details Mia 2011 The Death and Return of Superman Eradicator Folks Short film 2013 Snowflake, the White Gorilla Petunia Voice role 2014 Almost Heroes 3D Sue Voice role, final project before death == TV series == * MADtv - Cassidy Gifford (2000; 1 episode) * Malcolm in the Middle - Daisy / Penelope (2003, 2005; 2 episodes) * Law & Order: Special Victims Unit - Holly Purcell (2005; 1 episode) * Zoey 101 - Trisha Kirby (2005; 1 episode) * Will & Grace - Lisa (2006; 1 episode) * iCarly - Sam Puckett (2007-2012; 96 episodes, lead role) * True Jackson, VP - Pinky Turzo (2009-2010; 2 episodes) * The Penguins of Madagascar - Becky (2010-2013; voice) * The Cleveland Show - Girl #1 (2010; voice, 1 episode) * Big Time Rush - Training Fan (2010; 1 episode) * Victorious - Ponnie / Linda / Fawn (2012; 1 episode) * Sam & Cat - Sam Puckett (2013-2014; lead role) ==Notes== ==References== ==Other websites== * Jennette McCurdy on Facebook * Jennette McCurdy on Twitter * Category:1992 births Category:Living people Category:American child actors Category:American television actors Category:Actors from Los Angeles Category:Singers from Los Angeles Category:American stage actors Category:American movie actors Category:American voice actors Category:American country singers Category:American pop singers Category:People with anorexia
title: Jennette McCurdy
